_header: To speak of the thread now me list
Subjects: John the evangelist, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. John the Evangelist, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
to spek of þe thred now me lesteþat is of Iohn þe
                    ewangeliste…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…pray for vs þat ve hyne twynebut det schame ore dedly
                    syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.53-62.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.109-28.
